titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that the Chief of the Army Nurse Corps be appointed in the regular grade of brigadier general.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Committee on Armed Services requested executive comment from Department of Defense.
Referred to Subcommittee on Manpower and Personnel (Arm Serv).

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Requires that the Chief of the Army Nurse Corps be appointed in the regular grade of brigadier general.
